data.message:
most of the people i encounter in life are practicly fakes
i say practicly coz actions speak louder than verbal mistakes
actually in my soul i loose control
and my heart gets the shakes
coz slavery to fakery
has always been one of hates
basicly yu say to me 
that your one of my mates
than backstab me and shit on the grass with the snakes 
it fastrates me that you hate me and jelousy relates 
than zelously.takes over your personalit trates
thats why therez some things things that i dont expose
my emotions sing some silent notez
vilionce grows inside my soul silents screams aloud i joke
my facial expression looks like i swore down that my red nose just spoke my fatal depressions hidden deep beneath a front of hope !!! anything dumb about that..fuk yu if yu dont feel me too ahha

replies.message: Shit. Barely made sense was just words that rhymed. Basic words too. Also lyrics just written down don't do you much justice at all just exposes you're simple structure. Link me to some tracks if you have any recorded and then I can make a proper judgement bro.
